answers.answer: I guess naturally for me  they didn't say anything bout inducing my labor ..
With my first baby I had that and I was induced the same day I was due.
How far are you ? And oh I'm almost 34 weeks and was told only if the baby seems big but they still haven't done an ultrasound

I had it with my first and was induced a day before my due date. I am pregnant with my second and due March 11th but I find out this Tuesday when I will be getting induced. My doc wants to induce at 37 weeks so I speak with the specialist and he will decide. I have gestational diabetes once again along with gestational hypertension.
What are other reasons for being induced other then weight
High blood pressure and diabetes. Most doctors won't let you go full term.
I had it and I didn't get induced till 41 weeks. She wanting he to try to come naturally.

I have GD and haven't had my baby yet. I'm 34 weeks and baby is measuring two weeks ahead. I have another ultrasound at 36 weeks and my doctor says if he's still measuring big then she'll induce. But normally she'd try to keep him in until my due date. She's worried his shoulders will be too big by my due date and will result in a C section.

I think they'll induce you depending on how your baby continues to grow, and normally if it's safer health wise they'll take the baby early and induce you. But if they haven't said anything to you about induction then no reason to be concerned, but ask them if it's a potential outcome

question: So anyone have gestational diabetes and get induced or did your doctor make you wait till labor came naturally??
title: anyone  ?
